lines: 1. Bagendi ng'ai mogochia,Nechinyimbo koboko?Na togende orogendo,'As'ogochika Kwaye.Ebitunwa n'amagoko,Nkogenda tore nka bwoye,Nkogenda tore nka Bwoye,Ase ense engiya x2
2. Bagendi nki morigetie,As'enseria engiya?Yanga ndabu ne chigutwa,korwa as'Omotoria.Tonyw'amache y'obogima,Tomeny' amo na Nyasae,Natomeny' amo botambe,Ase ense engiya x2.
3. Bagendi togende nainwe,Gochi' ens' eria engiya?Inchwo bono mwancheirwe,nchwo, Mosoe 'mogand' oito.Inchwo, nchwo, timototiga,Krist' oganyir' atoire.'Ganyir' atoire Bwoye,As' ens' eria engiya x2.
